extension.name: Eshop Notify
extension.author: Giang Dinh Truong
extension.description: This plugin sends the email automatically to customers when a product is available

field.name: last_run
field.label: Last Run Time
field.description: Store Last Run Time of the plugin.

field.name: time_period
field.label: Time Period (Minutes)
field.description: Please enter a period of time in minutes to send notify. Default is 30.

field.name: number_emails
field.label: Number Emails
field.description: Number of emails which we will send notify each time the plugin run.

field.name: bcc_email
field.label: BCC Email
field.description: If you want to receive a copy of notify email so that you can keep track of notify, enter the email you want here.
